name: SubQuest
description:
Story 

You are an adventurer tasked by the nearby town to clear a small dungeon from monsters. Complete the task and continue on your way, or fail and unalive in the dungeon. 

SubQuest is an Arcade Action game. Select a skill at the start of the game. As you level up, pick from a list of randomized upgrades for your skill and fight your way through all 10 floors of the dungeon. 

Movement
  • Use Joystick to Move 
  • When not moving, start attacking 
  • When moving, not attacking 
Progression 

There will be 10 Floors in total to clear. As you progress, there will be more and more monsters spawning. Once all the monsters on a Floor are cleared, proceed to the grate to go to the next floor.

MAGES Institute of Excellence

SubQuest was developed over a 6 week period by DGDT Student Valerie Yeo as part of the Mobile Game Development Module.
